about_the_game:
Boomerang Jack features a style scoring system and intense skill-based combat. Combat encounters present a variety of enemy combinations, movement challenges and fight design encouraging players to use everything at their disposal.






Boss fights present multiple phases of chaotic carnage - mixing parkour-style platforming, bullet-hell attack patterns, tight timing of parries and dashes, and over-the-top abilities and combos.

Skill-Based Combat

  • Challenge unique bosses and enemies that demand clever movement and varied attacks.
  • Master a range of abilities, such as grappling hooks, bullet-time parries, telekinetic tornadoes, and blinding shockwaves.
  • Experiment with unlockable boomerang attacks to determine the best ones for various encounters.
  • Learn the style ranking system, which encourages skillful aggressive play, often using Jack's full arsenal throughout a single fight.

A Mysterious World To Explore

  • Travel across the deadly seas and strange lands.
  • Explore desert, snow, lava, pirate ships, caverns, swamps, and more.
  • String together parkour moves to fluidly traverse treacherous environments.
  • Solve simple puzzles that require light exploration and intuitive use of your abilities.

Jack's Mission

  • Investigate the Pirate King's sinister plot and determine how deep it goes.
  • Don't let your past affect you. The mission is the number one priority.
  • Uncover a dark, impending reality that will shake the world.

legal_notice: Recall Interactive LLC has a trademark application filed with the US Patent and Trademark Office for "Boomerang Jack" and intends to trademark this title.
name: Boomerang Jack Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GT Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Boomerang Jack is an action-adventure RPG with free-flowing combat. String together boomerang attacks with kinetic movement and upgradeable powers. Embark on a globe-trotting quest to stop the Pirate King.
